WITH recursive dept_child_list(dept_key, dept_name, upper_dept_key) AS ( SELECT a.dept_key, a.upper_dept_key, a.dept_name FROM to0_dept_mast a WHERE dept_key = #{deptKey} UNION ALL SELECT a.dept_key, a.upper_dept_key, a.dept_name FROM to0_dept_mast a, dept_child_list b WHERE a.upper_dept_key = b.dept_key ) SELECT dept_key, dept_name, upper_dept_key FROM dept_child_list WHERE dept_key != #{deptKey}
